tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE geofence_areas (
    geofence_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR(255),
    area_description TEXT,
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 8),
    longitude DECIMAL(11, 8)
)

CREATE TABLE geofencing_areas (
    area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    longitude FLOAT NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE notifications (
    notification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    area_id INT NOT NULL,
    notification_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    notification_message TEXT NOT NULL,
    notification_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE notifications (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  geofence_id UUID,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE geofence_logs (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID,
  geofence_id UUID,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Geofencing_Areas (
    geofence_id UUID NOT NULL,
    area_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    coordinates JSONB NOT NULL,
    notification_type ENUM('entry', 'exit') NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (geofence_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Notifications (
    notification_id UUID NOT NULL,
    user_id UUID NOT NULL,
    notification_type ENUM('entry', 'exit') NOT NULL,
    notification_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (notification_id)
);
